abstract.t: A RFC was accepted extending TLS usage to include OpenPGP keys (RFC5081) as an alternative or in addition to X.509 certificates,however the author did not really standardise the way theinformation in OpenPGP keys was to be presented and this could bedetrimental or fragment efforts to utilise OpenPGP keys in thismanner.The author didn't touch on the issue generating confidence scoresbeyond potential use of Certificate Authorities.
